CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 27, 1954, pg. 21 reads: "Herron Hill P-TA Rallies to Keep Teen Canteen - Game Room - Quiet recreation is available for those who want it in game room, where the P-TA provides the supplies."
TitMainTitle: Man and woman, supervising group of girls, and boys, including boy in foreground wearing checkered plaid shirt and dark pants, seated at table playing checkers, in recreation room, Herron Hill Junior High School
